video.title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer!
video.synopsis: Thwarted in their attempt to take over the world of Ente Isla, Satan and his general Alciel land in modern-day Tokyo, where they take on human form.

episodes.synopsis: When a hero vanquishes his underworld army, the devil flees to Earth, vowing to one day reign again. But in the meantime, he needs a job!
episodes.title: The Devil Arrives in Sasazuka

episodes.synopsis: When Emilia the hero finally tracks down the ruler of demons here on Earth, he's not exactly what she was expecting.
episodes.title: The Hero Stays at the Devil's Castle for Work Reasons

episodes.synopsis: Something supernatural seems to be going on with Chiho. Meanwhile, it's possible Maou doesn't really understand the concept of a "date."
episodes.title: The Devil Goes on a Date with His Junior in Shinjuku

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of the cave-in, Emi sees a side of Maou that doesn't jibe with the demonic king she knew in Ente Isla.
episodes.title: The Hero Experiences Human Warmth

episodes.synopsis: Lucifer is wrecking the neighborhood in a big way, and Emi, Maou and Ashiya must work together to save themselves and their new Earthly home.
episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Save Sasazuka

episodes.synopsis: Back in Ente Isla, the other high priests find out about Olba's betrayal. Meanwhile, Lucifer's moved into the Devil's Castle.
episodes.title: The Devil Climbs the Stairway to School

episodes.synopsis: Maou and company find that a young lady named Suzuno has moved in next door. She is quick to make friends and starts helping them out.
episodes.title: The Devil's Budget Is Saved by Neighborliness

episodes.synopsis: Emi and Suzuno have some epic miscommunications, but when they finally get those straightened out, they're even less on the same page than before.
episodes.title: The Hero Enters the Fray

episodes.synopsis: Insisting that Emi and Suzuno need an impartial third party to resolve their dispute, Rika goes with them to meet Maou.
episodes.title: The Hero Experiences a Fray

episodes.synopsis: It's a busy day at the local amusement park, with crowded restaurants, animals on the loose, scary ghosts and a much-needed swimwear intervention.
episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Take a Break from the Daily Routine

episodes.synopsis: The stranger Suzuno met at the train station has her reconsidering her position on the devil. Emi, however, is unwavering.
episodes.title: The Hero Stays True to Her Convictions

episodes.synopsis: The archangel Sariel is willing to torture people to get what he wants, and he's confident that no one can stop him.
episodes.title: The Devil Carries Out His Duties

episodes.synopsis: Ashiya needs to discuss something important with his master in private: Are the demons going back to Ente Isla?
episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Do Some Honest Hard Work
